text: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Gadag is a CBSE affiliated school in Gadag District of Karnataka under the Hyderabad region of Navodaya Vidyalaya Samiti (NVS). JNV Gadag is located near village Korlahalli of Mundargi taluka. This school is a residence school and all facilities to the students is free of cost. ==References== ==External links == * Category:Schools in Gadag district Category:Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas in Karnataka Category:Educational institutions established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in India
title: Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya, Korlahalli
